title: Provides for the corporation to do studies in targeted areas of Buffalo as part of a retail revitalization program
summary: Provides for the corporation to do studies in targeted areas of Buffalo as part of a retail revitalization program; reports to legislature no later than July 1, 2012.
lawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
actClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to requiring the corporation to study the city of Buffalo for the purpose of fostering the growth of business and industry in New York state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
